Full crude oil assay in minutes
The fastest crude oil quality analyser for refineries, powered by AI and low-field NMR technology

PRODUCT OVERVIEW

Automating Crude Oil Analysis

The Rombo AI Analyzer is a cutting-edge solution designed to transform spectral analysis through the power of artificial intelligence. Integrating state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms with robust spectral analysis techniques, this platform offers unparalleled accuracy, efficiency, and depth of insight for crude oil.

Clients & Partners

Trusted by Leading Refineries around the world

We are committed to maintaining the highest level of confidentiality and professionalism in our partnerships. We operate under strict Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDA) to protect the proprietary data and interests of our clients - leading refineries and petrochemical companies worldwide.

PRODUCT FEATURES

NMR AI Analyzer

1. AI-Powered AutoML for Spectral Data

  • Build custom machine learning models without AI expertise
  • Automate model training, feature selection, and optimization

2. Seamless Integration with Lab Instruments

  • Works with NMR, IR, GCMS, and other common spectroscopy techniques
  • Supports standard data formats for easy compatibility
  • Enables real-time predictions directly from lab instruments

3. No-Code to Low-Code Flexibility

  • No-code interface for easy AI model creation
  • Low-code framework for full customization
  • Advanced Python library for data scientists and ML engineers

4. Accelerate R&D & IP Creation

  • Reduce time-to-production with faster prototyping
  • Build proprietary AI models to create internal IP
  • Improve precision and automation in spectral analysis
